effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Causes the target to flinch. Can only be used on the user’s first turn after entering the field.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. Causes the target to flinch. Can only be used on the user’s first turn after entering the field.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. Causes the target to flinch. Can only be used on the user’s first turn after entering the field.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Can only be used as the first move after the user enters battle. Causes the target to flinch.
short_effect.platinum: Can only be used as the first move after the user enters battle. Causes the target to flinch.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Can only be used as the first move after the user enters battle. Causes the target to flinch.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: An attack that hits first and makes the target flinch. This move works only on the first turn.
flavor_text.platinum: An attack that hits first and makes the target flinch. This move works only on the first turn.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: An attack that hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.
